name_localized.en: Accessible Room 2 Queen Beds - Roll-In Shower
name_localized.fr: Accessible Room 2 Queen Beds - Roll-In Shower
name_localized.it: Accessible Room 2 Queen Beds - Roll-In Shower

short_description_localized.en: Our Accessible Studio room with two queen size beds is thoughtfully designed to create a spacious, 46-square-meter/495-square-foot sanctuary for your vacation in New York.
short_description_localized.fr: Our Accessible Studio room with two queen size beds is thoughtfully designed to create a spacious, 46-square-meter/495-square-foot sanctuary for your vacation in New York.
short_description_localized.it: Our Accessible Studio room with two queen size beds is thoughtfully designed to create a spacious, 46-square-meter/495-square-foot sanctuary for your vacation in New York.

description_localized.en: Our Accessible Studio room with two queen size beds is thoughtfully designed to create a spacious 46-square-meter/495-square-foot sanctuary for your vacation in New York. There are two queen size beds, comfortable armchairs and an Italian marble bathroom with roll in shower and grab bars, meeting all ADA code requirements. The room is complemented by Empire-style cherry wood furniture and elegant furnishings.
description_localized.fr: Our Accessible Studio room with two queen size beds is thoughtfully designed to create a spacious 46-square-meter/495-square-foot sanctuary for your vacation in New York. There are two queen size beds, comfortable armchairs and an Italian marble bathroom with roll in shower and grab bars, meeting all ADA code requirements. The room is complemented by Empire-style cherry wood furniture and elegant furnishings.
